org.fcrepo.client

Class PostBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.client.RequestBuilder
      • org.fcrepo.client.BodyRequestBuilder
        • org.fcrepo.client.PostBuilder

  • public class PostBuilder
extends BodyRequestBuilder
    Builds a post request for interacting with the Fedora HTTP API in order to create a new resource within an LDP container.
    Author:
    bbpennel

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.fcrepo.client.RequestBuilder
